name: Fleas To Fields
description:
You have hit rock bottom, can you climb up from this chasm or will you die trying?

This is simple game I tinkered with for a few hours over the weekend. If it turns out that someone likes the general concept, I'll continue development.

Note:

This is a work in progress, but does contain a little bit of art

Current Features:

  • Can move around, sleep, and spend a little gold, and die
  • Background art displayed for each area

Planned Features:

  • Skills that develop over time
  • Diverse crafting, and trade system
